comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com
comments.creator: mconley@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: From a cursory glance, it looks like accountProvisioner.css has a bunch of unused rules in it.  We should go through those with a fine-tooth comb and find out which ones are never used, and remove them.
comments.text: From a cursory glance, it looks like accountProvisioner.css has a bunch of unused rules in it.  We should go through those with a fine-tooth comb and find out which ones are never used, and remove them.
